alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:18PM EST until January 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of one tenth to a quarter of an inch, with higher amounts up to four tenths of an inch in the St. Lawrence Valley. * WHERE...The St. Lawrence Valley and northern Adirondacks of New York, the northern Champlain Valley, and all of eastern Vermont east of the Green Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will develop this afternoon and evening, and continue tonight before tapering off early Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
